Name: Description
Description: Welcome to Farm Slots. Use your winnings to build your own farm!

Name: ClickWheatMachine
Description: I can't wait to get into Wild Wheat. Let's get on with the fun!

Name: ClickSpin
Description: Awesome fun with every spin!

Name: ClickOrderPanel
Description: You're gonna need coins to establish your farm, and the best way to get those is to fulfil orders.

Name: SelectFirstOrder
Description: Collect or produce the items listed in your orders.

Name: CompleteFirstOrder
Description: Fulfil your orders to collect bonus coins. If you complete all your current orders you'll receive the jackpot!

Name: ClickFarm
Description: Let's go to the farm and have a look at the Mill.

Name: ClickFarmMachine
Description: The mill can now be unlocked! Do it!

Name: UnlockFarmMachine
Description: Just tap "OK" and the mill will be unlocked!

Name: UnlockFarmMachineNeedTime
Description: This will take a bit of time to unlock. How about playing some slots while you wait?

Name: WarehouseFull
Description: Your warehouse is totally full! You can choose to expand it or try completing some orders.

Name: SlotMachineNoOrder
Description: Oh, you can't get the items you need from this Slot right now. Maybe you can try playing a different one?

Name: ClickSpinAgain
Description: Wow, lucky you! There's plenty more fun to be had, so keep at it!

Name: CompletedAllOrders
Description: You're doing great! Keep completing orders and you'll receive even bigger rewards, which you can use to expand your farm.

Name: ClickOrdersTruck
Description: Wow, great work! All orders have been completed, tap the truck" to receive your jackpot!"

Name: AddedCompletedProducts
Description: Oh good, you've produced a new item that can now be collected!

Name: PresentedGems
Description: Here, have some gems. Use them to remove the wait time and play now.

Name: SpeedupFarmBuild
Description: Tap here to remove the wait time using gems.

Name: OpenFarmBuildingGift
Description: A new machine is ready, unwrap your present to see what's inside!

Name: PresentedChips1
Description: Don't worry, we'll give you another 100,000 chips to keep you going. Keep at it!

Name: PresentedChips2
Description: Ah! Here's another 100,000 chips. Make sure you play every day to get even more free chips!

Name: ClickFarmForPlayerShop
Description: There's another way to get rid of your surplus goods. Let's have a look at your shop!

Name: ClickFarmPlayerShop
Description: Surplus goods can be placed in your shop. They will be automatically sold for coins every few hours!

Name: ClickFarmPlayerShopSlot
Description: Place any item that you want to sell here, then come back after a while and you'll see that it's been sold!

Name: FarmPlayerShopPutSaleComplete
Description: Great! Don't forget to come back and collect your coins!

Name: OpenFarmWheatMachineGift
Description: Let's open this gift and have a look what's inside!

Name: OpenFarmMillGift
Description: Another surprise? Let’s have a look inside!

Name: ContinueGame
Description: You’re already familiar with the basic gameplay, so it’s time for you to continue on your own. Keep building your farm and I’ll pop in every now and then to see if you need any help.

Name: InGameFarmWharfOpen
Description: Do you hear the ship’s horn? Go have a look!

Name: RewardWheel
Description: You have a chance to spin the wheel each time you complete an order.

Name: ClickRewardWheelSpin
Description: Tap the SPIN button to spin the wheel. Remember, when the ship leaves you’ll lose all your chances to spin the wheel, so you should use them straight away! Good luck!

Name: ClickTask
Description: I just found a poor little dog. Can you help me look after it? Tap the button and complete a task each day, and if you can do this for 7 days the dog will be yours!

Name: kGameGuideCompleteOrderForFarmCoins
Description: No enough coins. Complete orders in your farm to win coins.

Name: ClickFarmForTreeholeBtn
Description: Little Charlie has stumbled across a mysterious portal inside a tree. What secrets could lie inside?

Name: ClickTreeholeInFarm
Description: With the discovery of this Tree Portal, a new journey begins…

Name: EnterTreehole
Description: Wow, new slots to play just by spending some coins! Plenty of winnings waiting to be won, you’d better hurry!
